additional_buffs.description: Raise [offline march] buff by 300%, and even if Succubus is in the Time Shop, the offline march buff increases. (5-Star 10%, 6-Star 30%, Max 1000%).
additional_buffs.name: Offline March

hidden_abilites: Raise all units' attack speed by 3%, critical damage by 7%.
When first appearing, casts madness buff that raises movement speed and attack speed of all male ally units.

Raise offline march buff by 300%, and even if Succubus is at the Time Shop, the offline march buff increases. (5-Star 10%, 6-Star 30%) However, the max buff of the offline march through Succubus is 1,000%.
description.skill1: Increase attack power of undead unit in Guild Raid (4.2%, 8.4%, 12.6%, 16.8%, 21%)
description.skill2: Increase critical damage of undead unit in Guild Raid (4.2%, 8.4%, 12.6%, 16.8%, 21%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Succubus ]
